About me

I am from Argentina, but during my sophomore year my journey took me to The Linsly School, a boarding high school in the United States. At Linsly, I've thrived both academically and athletically. I proudly hold the titles of varsity soccer player, varsity swimmer, and team captain. While excelling in sports and maintaining a strong academic record, my true passion lies in programming. As a front-end developer, I've honed my skills to create engaging and user-friendly websites, making technology accessible and enjoyable for users.

My Coding Career

I embarked on my coding journey at the tender age of 9, and now, at 18, I've amassed nine years of hands-on coding experience. My proficiency in JavaScript is unparalleled, having honed my skills over the years to craft captivating, user-centric web interfaces. I've had the privilege of contributing to substantial projects for various companies, a testament to my ability to thrive inS high-stakes environments.

Furthermore, I've bolstered my expertise with a collection of certifications from renowned companies like Google and others, each tailored to enhance my skills in web development. With a robust command of 43 programming languages, libraries, and frameworks, I am well-equipped to tackle a diverse range of coding challenges

Get-The-Box

An application with real time transactions, where you pay 1 dollar to post a photo and it will remain there until another user pays to post a photo.

Modern-Lottery

Modern lottery is the most complete application that I developed, here I apply all the knowledge of cryptocurrencies and program a blockchain to make transactions in etherum, here you bet when for you will be the value of a certain crypto in the next months.
